docs.title: Greedy
docs.description:
Greedy is a tool for fast medical image registration. It was developed by Paul Yushkevich at the Penn Image Computing and Science Lab at the University of Pennsylvania. The motivation for developing greedy was to have a really fast CPU-based deformable image registration tool that could be used in applications where many images have to be registered in parallel - like multi-atlas image segmentation.

Greedy borrows many concepts (and some implementation strategies) from the Symmetric Normalization (SyN) in ANTS. But greedy is non-symmetric, which makes it faster (in applications like multi-atlas segmentation, symmetric property is not required). Greedy also uses highly optimized code for image metric computation that adds extra speed.

docs.title: Output File
docs.description: Output file from affine or deformable registration
Paul's greedy diffeomorphic registration implementation

docs.title: Dimensions
docs.description: Number of image dimensions
Image pair (may be repeated)

docs.description: The fixed image

docs.description: The moving image

docs.title: Output
docs.description: Output file (matrix in affine mode; image in deformable mode, metric computation mode; ignored in reslicing mode)

docs.title: Affine
docs.description: Perform affine registration and save to output (-o)

docs.title: Brute Force Search
docs.description: Perform a brute force search around each voxel

docs.title: Moments of Inertia
docs.description: Perform moments of inertia rigid alignment of given order (1 or 2)

docs.title: Reslice
docs.description: Reslice images instead of doing registration

docs.description: The inverted warp file
Invert previously computed warp

docs.description: The input warp to be inverted

docs.description: The filename for the inverted warp output

Convert 2^N-th root of a warp

docs.title: Input Warp
docs.description: The input warp

docs.title: Output Warp
docs.description: The filename for the root warp output

docs.title: N
docs.description: The value of N for 2^N-th root

docs.description: The Jacobian determinant of the warp
Compute the Jacobian determinant of the warp

docs.title: Input Warp
docs.description: The input warp

docs.description: The filename for the Jacobian determinant output

docs.title: Metric Computation Mode
docs.description: Compute metric between images

docs.title: Deformable Optimization Mode
docs.description: Deformable optimization mode (experimental)

docs.title: Weight
docs.description: Weight of the next -i pair
Metric for the entire registration

docs.title: Metric Type
docs.description: Type of metric to use

docs.title: Metric Parameter
docs.description: Parameter for the metric (e.g., radius for NCC)

docs.title: Step Size
docs.description: Step size for optimization (default = 1.0), may also be specified per level (e.g. 0.3x0.1)

docs.title: Iterations
docs.description: Number of iterations per level of multi-res

docs.title: Threads
docs.description: Number of allowed concurrent threads

docs.title: Fixed Image Mask
docs.description: Fixed image mask (metric gradients computed only over the mask)

docs.title: Generate Fixed Image Mask
docs.description: Generate the fixed image mask by trimming the extent of the fixed image by given radius

docs.title: Moving Image Mask
docs.description: Moving image mask (pixels outside are excluded from metric computation)

docs.title: Dilate WNCC Masks
docs.description: Specifies that fixed and moving masks should be dilated by the radius of the WNCC metric during registration

docs.title: Reference Image
docs.description: Use supplied image, rather than fixed image to define the reference space

docs.title: Reference Padding
docs.description: Define the reference space by padding the fixed image by radius

docs.title: Background Value
docs.description: Value to fill missing values when mapping fixed and moving images to reference space

docs.title: Input Transform
docs.description: Specify transforms (matrices, warps) that map moving image to reference space

docs.title: Zero Last Dimension
docs.description: Sets sigmas and NCC radius to zero in the last dimension for 2D/3D registration

docs.title: Time Step Mode
docs.description: Time step behavior mode

docs.title: Smoothing
docs.description: Smoothing for the greedy update step (e.g., '1.732vox 0.7071vox')

docs.title: Inverse Warp Output
docs.description: Compute and write the inverse of the warp field

docs.title: Root Warp Output
docs.description: Compute and write the (2^N-th) root of the warp field

docs.title: Warp Precision
docs.description: Saved warp precision in voxels (default=0.1; 0 for no compression)

docs.title: Noise
docs.description: Standard deviation of white noise added to moving/fixed images when using NCC metric

docs.title: Exponent
docs.description: The exponent used for warp inversion, root computation, and in stationary velocity field mode

docs.title: Stationary Velocity Field Mode
docs.description: Perform registration using the stationary velocity model

docs.title: Stationary Velocity Field Mode (SVLB)
docs.description: Use more accurate but expensive update of v in stationary velocity field mode

docs.title: Incompressibility Mode
docs.description: Incompressibility mode, implements Mansi et al. 2011 iLogDemons

docs.title: Initial Warp
docs.description: Specifies the initial warp to start iteration from
Apply a regularization penalty based on the Jacobian of a tetrahedral mesh

docs.title: Mesh
docs.description: The tetrahedral mesh file

docs.title: Weight
docs.description: The weight of the penalty term

docs.title: SVF Smoothness Regularization Weight
docs.description: Weight of SVF smoothness regularization term (default: 1000)

docs.title: Initial Affine Transform
docs.description: Initial affine matrix for optimization

docs.title: Nifti Header Affine initialization
docs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on NIFTI headers

docs.title: Voxel Grid Affine Initialization
docs.description: Initialize affine matrix so that voxels with corresponding indices align

docs.title: Image Centers Affine Initialization
docs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching image centers

docs.title: Image Side Affine Initialization
docs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching center of one image side

docs.title: Moments Affine Initialization
docs.description: Initialize affine matrix based on matching moments of inertia

docs.title: Affine Degrees of Freedom
docs.description: Degrees of freedom for affine registration. 6=rigid, 7=similarity, 12=affine

docs.title: Jitter
docs.description: Jitter (in voxel units) applied to sample points (default: 0.5)
Random search over rigid transforms before starting optimization

docs.title: Number of Iterations
docs.description: Number of iterations for random search

docs.title: Rotation
docs.description: Standard deviation of random rotation angle (degrees) or 'any' or 'flip'

docs.title: Translation
docs.description: Standard deviation of random offset in physical units

docs.title: Force Determinant
docs.description: Force the determinant of transform to be either 1 (no flip) or -1 (flip)

docs.title: Assume Identity Covariance
docs.description: Assume identity covariance (match centers and do flips only, no rotation)

docs.description: Fixed image for reslicing

docs.description: The moving image to be resliced

docs.title: Output Image
docs.description: The filename for the resliced output image

docs.title: Warped Mesh
docs.description: The warped output mesh
Fixed/output surface pair (vertices are warped from fixed space to moving)

docs.title: Input Mesh
docs.description: The input mesh file

docs.title: Output Mesh
docs.description: The filename for the output warped mesh

docs.title: Interpolation Mode
docs.description: Interpolation for the next pair (NN, LINEAR*, LABEL sigma)

docs.title: Reslice Background
docs.description: Background (i.e. outside) intensity for the next pair (default 0)

docs.title: Reslice Data Type
docs.description: Data type for the next pair

docs.title: Reslice Composite
docs.description: Write composed transforms to outwarp

docs.title: Reslice Jacobian
docs.description: Write Jacobian determinant image to outjacobian

docs.description: The output mesh with computed Jacobian determinants
Compute Jacobian determinant for a simplex mesh in fixed space

docs.title: Input Mesh
docs.description: The input simplex mesh file

docs.title: Output Mesh
docs.description: The filename for the output mesh with Jacobian determinants

docs.title: Reslice Mask
docs.description: A binary mask for the fixed image; zero values will be overwritten with background

docs.title: Metric Gradient Output
docs.description: Write the gradient of the metric to file

docs.title: Debug Derivatives
docs.description: Enable periodic checks of derivatives (debug)

docs.title: Debug Derivative Epsilon
docs.description: Epsilon for derivative debugging

docs.title: Debug Affine Objective
docs.description: Plot affine objective in neighborhood of -ia matrix

docs.title: Dump Pyramid
docs.description: Dump the image pyramid at the start of the registration

docs.title: Dump Moving
docs.description: Dump moving image at each iter

docs.title: Dump Frequency
docs.description: Dump frequency

docs.description: Prefix for dump files (may be a path)

docs.title: Use Powell's Method
docs.description: Use Powell's method instead of LGBFS

docs.title: Use Single Precision
docs.description: Use single precision floating point (off by default)

docs.title: Version
docs.description: Print version info

docs.description: Verbosity level (0: none, 1: default, 2: verbose)
